0.1.2.name: wordpress/scripted-api
0.1.2.description: Scripted helps small and large businesses write expert marketing content. We attract and screen the best American freelance writers with expertise ranging from healthcare to hardware. We offer a satisfaction guarantee and flat rate pricing on each of our formats, which include blog posts, white papers, tweets, press releases, and website copy. For high volume customers, we offer full account support and a robust API to post jobs and pull content automatically. Past clients include Levi's, Viacom, and VeriSign, and numerous startups in the Bay Area and around the world.
